summary: Frontend testing complete for Signals tab removal and Signal Bubbles integration. All requested features verified: (1) Main navigation has only 'Command' and 'Analytics' tabs - Signals tab correctly removed, (2) TradingBotPanel visible on Command tab with all components, (3) Backend /api/live-scanner/alerts endpoint working (returns 0 alerts currently), (4) Signal bubbles section correctly conditional - only renders when liveSignals.length > 0, (5) Market Intelligence panel visible with AI-generated reports.

issues: WebSocket shows 'Disconnected' status - known issue for quotes stream, not related to core functionality

passed_tests: Main tabs container has exactly 2 tabs: Command and Analytics
Signals tab correctly REMOVED from navigation
Bot status indicator shows STOPPED/ACTIVE state
Mode selector buttons present: Autonomous, Confirmation, Paused (data-testid='mode-*')
Trade tabs present: Pending (0), Open (0), Closed (0) (data-testid='tab-pending/open/closed')
Daily P&L section visible with Today's P&L, Trades, Win Rate, W/L stats
GET /api/live-scanner/alerts returns success with scanner_running: true
GET /api/live-scanner/status shows scanner running with 4 scans, 0 alerts
Live signals strip correctly hidden when alerts count is 0
Analytics tab navigation works - shows Learning Loop with strategy performance
Market Intelligence panel visible with Early Market Report content
critical_code_review_comments: Signal bubbles only render when liveSignals.length > 0 (Line 911 conditional)
Signal bubbles have correct data-testid='signal-bubble-{SYMBOL}' for testing
handleTickerClick correctly calls onTickerSelect to open modal
CommandCenterPage.js correctly has only 2 tabs: coach (Command) and analytics

mocked_apis.note: All APIs are real - scanner running but 0 alerts generated (normal when no trade setups detected)

context_for_next_testing_agent: Signals tab removal verified. Key test data-testids: main-tabs, tab-coach, tab-analytics, trading-bot-panel, mode-autonomous/confirmation/paused, tab-pending/open/closed, bot-settings-btn, toggle-bot-btn, live-signals-strip (only visible when alerts > 0), signal-bubble-{SYMBOL}, market-intel-panel. Scanner is running with 15 symbols watchlist, 90s interval, 4 enabled setups (rubber_band, vwap_bounce, breakout, squeeze).

live_signals.note: Signal bubbles only render when liveSignals.length > 0

market_intelligence.report_content: Early Market Report with market status, news movers, bot activity
